name: Clash of Steel: World War II Europe 1939-45
name_original: Clash of Steel: World War II Europe 1939-45
description:
Clash of Steel: World War II Europe 1939-45 is a strategy game developed by Strategic Simulations. It was originally released in 1993. Strategic Simulations published the game.
Clash of Steel: World War II Europe 1939-45 is available on PC.
